metadata.title: CVE-2019-0222 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache ActiveMQ 5.0.0 - 5.15.8, unmarshalling corrupt MQTT frame canlead to broker Out of Memory exception making it unresponsive.

criterions.comment: activemq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
mqtt-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
